explanation: [0-0] A black and white dog is stranded on a narrow ledge in front of a building, with muddy floodwater rushing below. The dog is scared and unsure of what to do. Behind the dog is a white rolling shutter door and wall. A red circle appears and then disappears.

[0-10] Then, a man wearing a blue jacket and black pants appears, cautiously approaches the dog and touches it with his hand. He then bends down with effort and picks up the dog while stroking it. Black and white arrows appear in the image. The man turns away with the dog in his arms, at which point the place where they were standing collapses due to the flood.
